comment.author: 35179849@N08
comment._content: What is the fancy old building on the corner of Macquarie St where the court is now ?

comment.author: 37426109@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/mich2009] I don't think the buildings there have changed much, you might find they are built over, but not demolished.

comment.author: 35672655@N00
comment._content: the fancy old bldg cnr macquarie st was the Queens Club Chambers which was demolished to make way for Law courts in 1974. museumvictoria.com.au/collections/itemimages/152/930/1529...
